analysis.description:
GHTToken.refundTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0x50625b636dab619bf6af75f693dc486e56c2a694.sol#365-375) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_refund,_value) (/unique_chucks/17/0x50625b636dab619bf6af75f693dc486e56c2a694.sol#371)
